51  static int get_16bit_value(unsigned int low, unsigned int high)
52  {
53 
54 
55  int value;
56  long temp;
57 
58  temp = (high << 8) | low;
59  if (temp > 32768) temp -= 65536;
60  value = static_cast <int> (temp);
61  return value;
62  }
63 
64 
71  static float convert(int value, int range)
72  {
73 
74  return value / 32768.0 * range;
75  }
76 };

216 
223  void calibrate(int rounds)
224  {
225  float axsum = 0.0f, aysum = 0.0f, azsum = 0.0f;
226  float axoffset = 0.0f, ayoffset = 0.0f, azoffset = 0.0f;
227 
228  std::cout << "Keep accelerometer according to ax = 0 ay = 0 az = 1" << std::endl;
229 
230  for (int i; i < rounds; i++)
231  {
232  get_binary_data();
233  get_sample();
234 
235  std::cout << "ax = " << ax << " ay = " << ay << " az = " << az << endl;
236 
237  axsum += ax;
238  aysum += ay;
239  azsum += az;
240  usleep(25000);
241  }
242  axoffset = axsum / rounds;
243  ayoffset = aysum / rounds;
244  azoffset = azsum / rounds - 1;
245  }
246 };

372 class Magnetometer: public Sensor3Axis

374  private:

379  public:

401  {
402  return this->range;
403  }

412  mx = convert(this->mx, this->range);
413  my = convert(this->my, this->range);
414  mz = convert(this->mz, this->range);
415  }
416

425  this->mz = 0;
426  this->range = 0;
427  }

430

452  this->range = range;

455 
462  void calibrate(int rounds)
463  {
464  float mxmax = -32768.0f, mymax = -32768.0f, mzmax = -32768.0f;
465  float mxmin = 32767.0f, mymin = 32767.0f, mzmin = 32767.0f;
466  float mxoffset = 0.0f, myoffset = 0.0f, mzoffset = 0.0f;
467  float mxscale = 0.0f, myscale = 0.0f, mzscale = 0.0f;
468  float chordx = 0.0f, chordy = 0.0f, chordz = 0.0f;
469  float chord_average = 0.0f;
470 
471  std::cout << "Rotate compass" << std::endl;
472 
473  for (int i = 0; i < rounds; i++)
474  {
475  get_binary_data();
476  get_sample();
477 
478  std::cout << "mx = " << mx << " my = " << my << " mz = " << mz << std::endl;
479 
480  mxmin = min(mxmin, mx);
481  mymin = min(mymin, my);
482  mzmin = min(mzmin, mz);
483 
484  mxmax = max(mxmax, mx);
485  mymax = max(mymax, my);
486  mzmax = max(mzmax, mz);
487  }
488  mxoffset = (mxmax + mxmin) / 2.0f;
489  myoffset = (mymax + mymin) / 2.0f;
490  mzoffset = (mzmax + mzmin) / 2.0f;
491 
492  chordx = (mxmax - mxmin) / 2.0f;
493  chordy = (mymax - mymin) / 2.0f;
494  chordz = (mzmax - mzmin) / 2.0f;
495 
496  chord_average = (chordx + chordy + chordz) / 3;
497 
498  mxscale = chord_average / chordx;
499  myscale = chord_average / chordy;
500  mzscale = chord_average / chordz;
501  }
502 };

515 
520  void setP(double Pressure)

522  this->Pressure = Pressure;
523  }
524 
525  public:
526 
527 
531  Barometer()
532  {
533  this->Pressure = 0;
534  }
535 
536 
541  double getP()
542  {
543  return this->Pressure;
544  }
545 
546 
551  float getDepth()
552  {
553  return static_cast<float>(getP() - 101325) / (9.80665 * 997);
554  }
555 
556 
561  float getAltitude()
562  {
563  return static_cast<float>(1 - pow((getP() / 101325), .190295) * 145366.45 * .3048);
564  }
565 };
